articles.title: Netflix's Reed Hastings changed the way we watch TV – for better or for worse - The Guardian
articles.description: The departing CEO’s humble company soared to stunning success and paved the way for imitators
articles.content:
Perhaps nothing sums up the legacy of Netflix co-founder Reed Hastings as neatly as a certain Dr Pepper commercial.
